title: field-configuration-callbackname.response
description: Response for retrieving a purchase order field dynamic configuration

errorCode.description: Error code returned from the vendor's API, if any

callBackInfo.description: Optional callback information to be used in the next request. Only present if a callback is needed

options.description: Options to display for fields that are dropdowns or fixed option sets.

isVisible.description:
If true or unspecified, the field will be shown to the user. If false, the field is hidden.
Can be used to hide fields based off of values of other fields

isRequired.description:
If true, the field will be required to send an electronic purchase order.
If false, the field is optional.
If unspecified, will revert to the default setting for the field in the vendor configuration.

defaultValue.description: The default value to pre-populate the field with, if any

shouldCallback.description: Controls whether another request should be made

values.description:
Generic object to be passed to the next request
Used for passing data between chained requests

id.description: The identifier/value to send back on pricing or purchase order calls when this option is selected

name.description: The option display name to display to the user

cost.description: For line-item fields, selecting this option will change the price of the item to the value specified
